thread.title: How to Rent a New York City Apartment Without Paying a Deposit

author: Josh Barbanel
title: How to Rent a New York City Apartment Without Paying a Deposit
text:
In New York the rent is too darn high, and so is the security deposit.
Now some landlords are trying to lighten the burden.
Owners of some of New York Cityâ€™s largest apartment buildings are signing up for services that allow tenants to pay smaller, nonrefundable fees rather than plunking down hefty security deposits that will languish in low-interest... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
